text:
This izakaya is fairly average considering its price point. Given the competitive landscape in the area, it could benefit from being more distinctive.

Ordering was a bit cumbersome due to the digital menu and lack of images, which made it challenging to balance business conversations with our meal selection. Fortunately, the food turned out to be decent.

Based on my experience, I'd likely only return for after-work drinks rather than a full dining experience.

The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, which made the atmosphere even better. The food was delicious, especially the fresh sashimi, which was so tasty! Highly recommend this place for anyone craving quality Japanese BBQ. Definitely coming back again!
Awesome service. Warm and friendly staff. Great food.

The shop is located in town. Quite convenient for a meet up after working hours.

Even though the sashimi are fresh, the portion itself doesnâ€™t match up to its price.

The grilled meat are delicious.
Great izakaya, cosy and with good service! I recommend the wagyu kishimen (flat noodles), which is tasty and quite filling!
